channel.title: Damage help
channel.description:
Alright, I want to fix ice barrage, and the damage that it does.
This is the code that it shows: [Code=java]hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25)[/code] What do I change to fix the hits? Or is this the wrong thing to change?
If I want the max it can hit is 30, how do I do that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 06:56:24 pm[/size][hr]Anyone, please.

item.title: Damage help
